tasks.task: Set up and test a garden watering control system using a Raspberry Pi and HTML5 canvas.
subtasks: Access the Raspberry Pi via SSH.
Configure a relay control board connected to the Raspberry Pi.
Set up valves (manual and controlled) for water distribution.
Write a Node.js daemon to control the relay board.
Create an HTML5 canvas-based interface to visualize valve states.
Implement an override function for valve control.
Test the system by activating different zones.
Bleed pressure from the system to check for leaks.
Plan for integrating water source selection (rain tank vs. house water).
Consider adding soil moisture sensors and tank level monitors.
